long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay productive and maintain a healthy work-life balance with the Daily Reminder browser extension. Designed to remind you to take regular breaks throughout your day, this extension helps you avoid burnout and stay focused on your tasks.

Key Features:

Customisable Break Intervals: 
Select from a range of preset break intervals to suit your work style and preference.

Visual and Audio Notifications: 
Receive timely popup notifications along with optional audio alerts to gently remind you when it's time to take a break.

Real-time Progress Updates: 
Keep track of the time left until your next break with an inbuilt progress bar.

User-friendly Interface: 
Effortlessly start, stop, and adjust break settings with an intuitive and easy-to-use interface.

Discover the benefits of regular breaks and improve your productivity with the Daily Reminder browser extension. Give yourself the gift of balance today, Take a break!

Works and tested for MAC OSX!

Please Note: If the notification popup does not display at the end of the timer, please check your notification settings. These settings can be found in the web browser and your operating system settings. Also, Windows has a focus mode and OSX has a DND option that can block the notification. 

The reminder will only work while Chrome is open.

Thanks and I hope you find this is useful to you, Mat!
